name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 15 (Release) Shandong. A woman tearfully recounted her experience during the family planning period of the last century: In those days, anyone who had more than one child would be arrested by the "squad" and beaten.
My younger brother was born in 1982 and was considered an extra child. He was fined 1,000 yuan. The family scraped together the money and sold everything they had to pay the fine, which left the family extremely poor......

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 17, Henan. A veteran took the subway with a veterans discount card, but when he entered the station, it showed "invalid ticket" 
He shouted "What's the use of this (discount card)!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 16, Guangzhou, Guangdong. The boss of Yunda Shiling Station ran away, and the employees' wages were in arrears. The workers gathered together to demand their wages, and some workers were taken away by the police.
November 17, Xianyang, Shaanxi. The Yuhe Chenyuan building was unfinished, and the owners marched to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 18, Baicheng, Jilin. The roof of the Baicheng Skating Rink collapsed this morning. The picture shows that the entire roof has fallen off completely, and thick smoke is billowing at the scene. It is reported that the rink has been in use for less than 7 years.
Baicheng Emergency Management Bureau: The cause of the collapse of the building and the casualties are not clear yet.
One netizen said: "When did it collapse? It was about 5 pm today." Another netizen said: Fortunately, it didn't snow, otherwise it would be due to the snow.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 17, Suzhou, Jiangsu. An admissions teacher of Linghang Education was exposed online and posted on WeChat Moments: All the students who were killed were college students, so it is important to improve academic qualifications. If you want to save your life, sign up. Linghang's college-to-undergraduate program is trustworthy.
Suzhou Linghang Education issued a statement: The inappropriate remarks were personal behavior. After discussion by the company, he was fired. For the verbal abuse and slander on the Internet, legal means will be taken to protect the rights and interests.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Guangxi, a blogger interviewed passers-by outdoors: Which dynasty in history had the most corrupt officials?
Netizens posted pictures of "Hyundai" cars in the comment area, and some netizens asked which dynasty had the largest population? Alluding to China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 15, Xi Jinping arrived in Peru for a state visit. During his talks with the Peruvian president, he pronounced Peru (bì lǔ) as (mì lǔ).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 17 (Released) An Afghan woman said: The Taliban has weakened women's rights. Women no longer receive any education after the age of 12, cannot go out without a male guardian, and must cover their bodies completely. Women are also not allowed to work in the government and international organizations. 
"If there are no new women graduating from medical universities, I don't know how Afghanistan's medical system will develop in the future"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After a knife attack occurred at Wuxi Polytechnic, some people came to the school to send flowers and mourn.
One interviewee said: I feel that the current society is too violent. There seem to be a lot of murders in recent years. I didn't hear much about it before. I feel that everyone's mentality is not as healthy as before.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A notice from the Zhuhai Municipal Party Committee and the Municipal People's Government Office was circulated online, requiring all districts and departments to conduct a comprehensive investigation of lonely elderly people, as well as those without children, marriages, or parents. Each elderly person will receive 3 yuan in assistance every day.
It is reported that as early as 2023, Zhuhai had accurately investigated seven types of elderly people in need, with a monthly visit rate of 100% and a total of 17,000 visits.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
News on November 18: In October, the unemployment rate of 16-24 year-olds in urban areas nationwide, excluding students in school, was 17.1% 
The number of college graduates in 2025 is expected to be 12.22 million. Netizens said: "They said it would be hard for a while, but I didn't expect it would be hard for a lifetime" 
"One hundred steamed buns, ninety-nine people grab one steamed bun, and the remaining person eats ninety-nine steamed buns"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 17, a Zhihu netizen expressed his opinion on "a university in Wuxi stabbed someone". He said that these "piglets sold" by the school were paid much less than normal employees, and the money was eaten by the school.
And factories exploiting interns is not an isolated case: on November 5, a female student from Guangxi Economic Vocational College fell to her death less than ten days after entering the factory for internship; a technical secondary school in Yunnan forced students to work in the factory for 11 hours, and the school deducted 9 yuan from their hourly wages, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported online that some colleges and universities are investigating "whether there are any disputes caused by failure to obtain graduation certificates normally or related issues." Some students in Jiangsu also reported that the school has recently strengthened security measures.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A 42-year-old Chinese man named Jiao Lei (transliteration) was arrested.
He was lying in wait on the streets of Shibuya, Tokyo last month, and suddenly hugged the passing Japanese female artist "Kojima Haruna" and pushed her to the ground.
After being arrested, he said two sentences: "I really like him, but the staff won't let me see him" "I'm Taiwanese"
Currently, the man is detained on suspicion of violating the "Stalking and Harassment Regulation Act".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te attended the Youth Forum of Today's Weekly on the 16th. A student asked, "Can you lead the country to peace and avoid war?" In response, Lai Ching-te proposed three options for students to choose from, and most people chose the "Four Persistences". Lai Ching-te said that this is the path he will take as president, and he hopes to work with his classmates in the future to unite and firmly move in this direction to achieve the goal of peace.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 15, the Sichuan government issued the "Tender Announcement for the Survey/Section of the Chengdu Veteran Cadre Rest Base in the Tibet Autonomous Region". The project cost is about 10.686 billion yuan, and the construction funds come from national investment-government investment, with a project investment ratio of 100%. The total land area of the project is 649.7 acres, and the planned total construction area is 1,450,940 square meters.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is reported that three Henan Village Bank depositors, Shi Jianjian, Ouyang Yun, and Hu Weiming, were detained for nine months for provoking disturbances for defending their rights. Recently, the case was under the jurisdiction of the Qinyang Municipal People's Court.
At present, the three depositors are detained in Henan, and the trial date is unknown. Many depositors have called the Zhengzhou Procuratorate to inquire about the time they will be detained, but were threatened by the Procuratorate.
Wang Zihao, the defense lawyer in the case, said that if the court can properly handle the case and not magnify the adverse impact, I think the depositors will also treat the matter rationally.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the afternoon of November 18, in Chengdu, Sichuan, a passerby was exposed online for having an argument with a delivery man, who slashed his throat with a knife.
After injuring someone, the delivery man calmly sat aside and smoked a cigarette, and then the police arrived and handcuffed him and took him away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17 (Release), a blogger posted a clip from the TV series "In the Name of People". As a result, the video was flooded with comments such as "the ancestors of the people", "the masters of the people", and "the grandfather of the common people".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 17, Henan. Media reports said that a foreign Chinese medicine doctor Wuming found a woman in cardiac arrest. Wuming said that she was too thin and was afraid of breaking her ribs by doing CPR, so he patted the woman's arm and used Chinese medicine to save the woman from cardiac arrest. Wuming said: It's not that I'm good, it's the wisdom of the ancients that's good.
An emergency doctor reported to the media: Cardiac arrest requires CPR and ADE first aid. Patting the arm will not save a person with cardiac arrest. This is common sense.
